channel.title: People getting on my server help
channel.description:
ok so people can connect to my server through the moparscape webclient but cant through client..
anyideas how to change this??

item.title: People getting on my server help
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Dopple™, post:3, topic:290803”][quote author=Maximum ZxZ link=topic=384455.msg2884134#msg2884134 date=1248493868]
Yes, there’s some guide on TuT on how to allow only connection from the client that you want.

Search in section Tutorial.
[/quote]
I dont think he means that he means
they cant connect through his client.
Go to your client and look in client.java and change the ips.[/quote]

Be more specific, Dots, go to your client.java, press Ctrl + F and search for "no-ip, or “Ip”

You will find what your looking for, also press “next if you havent found the result yet”

Read full topic
item.source: People getting on my server help

item.title: People getting on my server help

item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:2, topic:290803”]Yes, there’s some guide on TuT on how to allow only connection from the client that you want.

Search in section Tutorial.[/quote]
I dont think he means that he means
they cant connect through his client.
Go to your client and look in client.java and change the ips.

Read full topic
